reviews.review: 'Ta bien. Si tenés se disfruta más. Si no, bueno, tendras que bancarte a los flammers (generalmente niños).

А game in which it is fashionable to play normally, only if you play it a lot.  be prepared for: angry kids, cheats, etc. Good luck

В эту игру можно играть только ради тех моментов, когда ты раз за разом проигрываешь, у тебя ничего не получается, но каждый новый раунд - это твой новый шанс за который ты цепляешься, как за свою жизнь, ты начинаешь все с самого начала и рано или поздно, ты возьмешь такой раунд, что все прошлые проигрыши станут абсолютно неважным для тебя.

Easy to get used to. Great casual and usually can have a few laughs in game. Dislike is that it can get a bit to competitive however that is what you expect from a competitive style game and the games can sometimes go to long.

Good game. Very competitive, which can be a good thing or a bad thing. Can be racist sometimes. Make sure to buy the prime upgrade if you don't want cheaters. But other than that, have fun.
it is really fun the graphics are amazing

After 8 years playing it, I didn't improve my skills in-game.

However, I learned new language skills: now I can curse in Russian and Brazilian Portuguese.

Also, my tolerance level to guttural screams and loud sounds was increased.

Now I can bear the crying of my children for longer and I can make them feel better by singing sweet traditional songs from other cultures, such as Очи чёрные (Dark Eyes) or Garota de Ipanema (The Girl from Ipanema).
